column1: can you tell me more about your back pain

column3: it is mostly in my lower back.

column1: does it radiate anywhere else
column3: not that i have noticed.  it pretty much just stays in my back.

column1: does anything make the pain worse or better
column3: [ pain3 ]bending down and moving makes it feel a lot worse.  the other day i couldn't even pick up a car part off of the bottom shelf.

column1: does anything make it feel better
column3: [ sadness2 ]the only thing that seems to help some is ibuprofen, and that doesn't help all that much.

column1: has it been a constant pain
column3: [ fear2 ]it is pretty constant although sometimes it is a little better or worse.  i hope that you can help make it better.  i really need to get back to my life.
